short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Effortlessly Search Keywords on Etsy, Amazon, and More!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you tired of manually copying and pasting keywords to search for products on Etsy and Amazon? Look no further! Introducing QuickSearch, the ultimate Chrome extension designed to streamline your keyword analysis process.

QuickSearch Extension simplifies the way you search for products on popular online marketplaces like Etsy and Amazon. With just a few clicks, you can easily search for any keyword directly from your desired website. No more hassle of switching tabs or re-typing the same keyword over and over again!

Here's how it works: While selling on platforms like Etsy or Amazon, it's crucial to conduct thorough keyword research. Instead of manually navigating to each website and performing searches individually, QuickSearch Extension allows you to search for keywords seamlessly.

Simply highlight the desired keyword, right-click, and select the "QuickSearch Extension" option. A drop-down menu will appear, offering you a choice between Etsy or Amazon. Upon selecting one, QuickSearch Extension will automatically initiate the search on the respective website, saving you valuable time and effort.

But wait, there's more! QuickSearch Extension doesn't limit you to Etsy and Amazon alone. If you frequently search for keywords on other websites, we've got you covered. Accessing the extension's settings is as easy as clicking on the QuickSearch icon in your Chrome extensions menu. From there, select "Options" to open a simple configuration screen.

In the options page, you can effortlessly add additional websites where you want to search for keywords. However, there's a small catch. To ensure seamless functionality, make sure to enter the search URL of the desired website, following the format used for Etsy. This includes including the search parameter in the URL.

QuickSearch Extension is a must-have tool for sellers looking to optimize their keyword analysis workflow. By simplifying and automating the process, you can spend more time focusing on what matters most â€“ growing your business and boosting sales.

Download QuickSearch Extension now and experience the convenience of efficient keyword analysis across multiple platforms. Save time, enhance productivity, and take your e-commerce game to new heights!
